name: Elaine's Scrambled Eggs
keywords: butter, eggs, heavy cream, side dish, spring
recipeIngredient: 8 tablespoons unsalted butter, cut into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients into a medium-size stainless-steel mixing bowl. Place the bowl over a pan of simmering water. Make sure the bowl does not touch the water.
Whisk all the ingredients continuously until the eggs are semi-set in small curds, about 10 minutes. The eggs should be soft.
